casebody.data:
Wanda BROACH-BUTTS, Administratrix of the Estate of Theotis Butts, Deceased, and Wanda Broach-Butts, in Her Own Right, Plaintiffs-Respondents,
and
Khalia Butts, Candice Butts, and Fores Butts, Plaintiffs,
v.
THERAPEUTIC ALTERNATIVES, INC., d/b/a Community Treatment Solutions, Defendant-Petitioner,
and
Drew Barrett, Jennifer Lawson, and Jenn Hess, Defendants,
and
Division of Child Protection and Permanency, Department of Children and Families, State of New Jersey, Family Services Association, Sequel Camelot Holdings, LLC, and Sequel of New Jersey, Inc., d/b/a Capital Academy, Defendants,
and
Performcare, Defendant/Third-Party-Plaintiff,
and
D.M., Third-Party Defendant. C-582 September Term 2018
081835 Supreme Court of New Jersey. February 8, 2019

ORDER

A petition for certification of the judgment in A-000755-16 having been submitted to this Court, and the Court having considered the same;

It is ORDERED that the petition for certification is denied, with costs.
